author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ark Restaurants Corp Reports Q2 Loss Per Share $0.19
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Ark Restaurants Corp:
* ARK RESTAURANTS ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE SECOND QUARTER OF 2018
* Q2 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 2.4 PERCENT * Q2 LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
